input_text.Prompt:
Given a product specification and product keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product specification:
MLB Philadelphia Phillies Delay Of Game Ath Red/Athletic Gray Marled Long Sleeve Mock Nck Synthetic Frntry Fzip

Product keywords:
Cotton 94%/Organic Cotton 6%
Long Sleeve Mock Neck Synthetic French Teery Full-Zip
Woven Label
Self-Fabric Applique.
Egypt
input_text.Response A: The Philadelphia Phillies Delay Of Game Ath Red/Athletic Gray Marled Long Sleeve Mock Nck Synthetic Frntry Fzip is a unique and innovative product, utilizing cutting-edge synthetic fabric technology to provide superior comfort and performance.  This exciting new product features a mock neck design with full-zip closure, providing a sleek, modern look while ensuring optimal fit and comfort.  The high-quality synthetic fabric offers superior moisture wicking properties, keeping the wearer dry and comfortable even during the most intense workouts or activities.  Additionally, the stylish marled design and eye-catching team colors make this product ideal for showing team spirit and enhancing any athletic wardrobe.  The Phillies DOG Ath is truly a top-quality product that is sure to please even the most discerning consumer.
input_text.Response B: The product is a red and gray long sleeve mock neck sweatshirt with a full-zip front made of cotton and organic cotton. It has a woven label and a self-fabric applique. The sweatshirt is made in Egypt.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
